A heavy cylinder made of metal, wood, or bone. Normally about 2 to 3 feet long, 1 inch thick, and 2 to 5 pounds.

While holding this focus, you gain a bonus to spell attack rolls. This bonus is determined by the focus’ rarity.

While Attuned

While somewhere on your person, you gain a bonus to the save DCs of spells you cast. This bonus is determined by the focus’ rarity.
